release_note.title: Release notes (selected features and issues only)
release_note.lines: * New language Tiếng Việt - Thanks to Murtagsh (9372637)!
* New language Malti - Thanks to LA-saviour26 (4149232)!
* Enhanced adultskilltable, youthskilltable and teamstats
* New module RapidId, a convenient way to view by ID
* New option that highlights teams which have set/changed their line-up within last week (LeagueNewsFilter module)
* New StaffMarker module option for team pages
* New option to hide notification box about unread messages within the Forum thread (FixcssProblems module)
* Option to open automatically hattrick-youthclub page after copying youth player source code, scout оr training report
* Automatic country and currency detection in Main Options (default on)
* Option to add 'Mark as unread from' under each posting (Forum -> MarkUnread module)
* Option to use icons in stead of text links in posting footer (ForumPresentation -> DisplayIcons)
* Mandatory warning when posting on stage forums beautified
Attention!
* GotoPostBox module hides Hattrick's new (and useless) 'Mark unread from ..'
* Transferfilter fix: old max bid values unfortunately might be lost
* Adultskilltable and youthskilltable merged to new skilltable module.
* Player faces modules merged. Your settings of those have been lost
* Module FixCss split in three new modules. Settings for those are back to default.
* SkinModule moved to presentation tab. Old skins need to get reloaded
* dbus alert option removed for AMO compliance.
* ForumAlltidFlags removed. Use HT's flags (HT's forum preferences) instead
* ForumStripLinks removed. Obsolete after HT-url doesn't include server anymore
For a complete list use bellow changes link and/or 'set new features' link
